channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gullies outside 4Kings Road and 24 Kings Road are blocked. This resulted yesterday in all the water falling on a kings Road north side running down and flooding the garden of 4Kings Road to a depth of at least 10cm and resulting in water incursion into building., 21st September
item.description:
Drains outside 24 and 4 Kings Road not running well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Kings Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permanently blocked drain on Priory Terrace, 21st September
item.description:
This drain has never to our recollection been cleaned or cleared of debris. Last night (20 September 2024) it very nearly caused catastrophe with residents’ basements. The photo shows the water after it had subsided. In ‘normal’ rain circumstances it blocks up and really needs attention. It is the only drain on the houses side of the terrace,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Priory Terrace, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reported to Parish Council by local resident, 21st September
item.description:
During the recent heavy rain, flash flooding occurred by The Royal Oak and all the drains along Gloucester Road were overwhelmed due to being clogged with leaves etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of potholes deeper than 40mm and longer than 300mm recently worsened after rain, 21st September
item.description:
Towards Journeys End at the bottom of Cold Slad Lane. Potholes worsening now after heavy rain and making driving dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Regarding FixMyStreet ref: 6380737., 21st September
item.description:
The above incident FixMyStreet ref: 6380737 was reported as fixed, but there are still potholes all over the M5 bridge, Lobleys Drive. It seems one has been patched but the others just ignored.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Drains are blocked. When raining water comes close to my house door. I live in no.33. Yesterday water nearly get in to my house!, 21st September
item.description:

item.title: Brambles growing along Jodami Crescent pathway, 21st September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
